code: const LS_KEYS={USER:'user',LOGIN:'login',BOOKS:'books',ADDEDBOOKS:'addedBooks'};class LocalStorageService{static get(key){const value=window.localStorage.getItem(key);try{return JSON.parse(value);}catch{return value;}}static set(key,value){return window.localStorage.setItem(key,JSON.stringify(value));}static remove(key){return window.localStorage.removeItem(key);}static removeAll(){return window.localStorage.clear();}}export{LocalStorageService,LS_KEYS};
